thread.title: Twitter to cut up to 336 jobs, or about 8% of global workforce: DJ
thread.title_full: Twitter to cut up to 336 jobs, or about 8% of global workforce: DJ

title: Twitter to cut up to 336 jobs, or about 8% of global workforce: DJ
text: October 13, 2015 at 08:32 AM EDT Twitter to cut up to 336 jobs, or about 8% of global workforce: DJ Last week, reports surfaced that Jack Dorsey was planning company-wide layoffs at Twitter that could affect all departments. Dorsey had been named permanent CEO on Oct. 5. "In June Dorsey told Re/code that the company needed to do a better job of" clarifying ownership "around projects, and he restructured Twitter's product team in August to do just that," the report...
